instructions:
CRITICAL: Use api_search to verify EVERY method you call. Never guess Enfusion API method names — they are non-standard and many obvious-sounding methods don't exist.
1. Use api_search to look up SCR_Faction, SCR_BaseGameMode, SCR_LoadoutManager, and any faction/loadout classes — verify methods exist before using them
2. Edit the FactionInit script to set your faction key, name, and color — only call methods confirmed by api_search
3. Edit the LoadoutConfig to define weapons and equipment
4. Create the character prefab with prefab_create — characters MUST inherit from a base game character prefab for animations and physics
5. Add your faction to the game mode's faction list in a modded SCR_BaseGameMode — verify the override method exists first
6. Test in Game Master by placing faction spawn points
